purpose: This email serves to invite submissions for the ICITS'26 conference scheduled for February 16-18, 2026, in Roatán Island, Honduras.
evidence_sentences: We are pleased to invite you to submit your original papers to ICITS'26.

ICITS'26 - 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems, to be held at Universidad Tecnológica de Honduras, Roatán Island, Honduras, between the 16th and the 18th of February 2026, is an international forum for researchers and practitioners to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, results, experiences and concerns in the several perspectives of Information Technology & Systems.
